General expense reporting.answer: If necessary, non-governmental organizations donated by the government must also follow the above principles within the scope of accepting government donations or entrusting matters.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How should I pay for the meal expenses for the year-end business review meeting and spring wine?
General expense reporting.answer: Year-end business review meetings and spring wine and other activities will not be held in principle in the future. However, if it is really necessary to hold the event, the meal expenses for the event should be covered by the “Cultural and Recreational Activities Fee”.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Which venues should be prioritized for meetings and training workshops?
General expense reporting.answer: When holding conferences and training workshops, priority should be given to using the facilities within Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If it is really necessary to handle activities, what expenses can the cultural and recreational activities fees be used for?
General expense reporting.answer: If it is really necessary to handle the event, the cultural and recreational activity fee can be used to pay for the meal of the event.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What restrictions and requirements are there when the various units in the hospital handle meetings and training lectures?
General expense reporting.answer: When the various units in the hospital conduct meetings and training seminars, they should give priority to using internal venues and facilities, and should not hold meetings outside the hospital to avoid increasing funds. In addition, activities such as year-end business review meeting and spring wine are not held in principle, but if it is really necessary, the event meal expenses should be paid by the "cultural and recreational activity fee".

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the payment standard for the translation fee?
General expense reporting.answer: The payment standards for translation fee are divided into general translation and special translation. For general translations of foreign languages ​​into Chinese, the price is 1,070-1,570 yuan per 1,000 words; for Chinese to foreign languages ​​or foreign languages ​​to foreign languages, 1,490-3,000 yuan per 1,000 words. For special translations of foreign languages ​​into Chinese, the price is 1,610-2,800 yuan per 1,000 words; for Chinese to foreign languages ​​or foreign languages ​​to foreign languages, 2,120-6,000 yuan per 1,000 words.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the difference between the price of special translations and general translations?
General expense reporting.answer: The price difference between special translations and general translations is mainly due to the relatively high cost of special translations. The asking price for special translations from foreign languages ​​to Chinese is 1,610-2,800 yuan per 1,000 words, while the price of special translations from Chinese to foreign languages ​​and foreign languages ​​to foreign languages ​​is 2,120-6,000 yuan per 1,000 words. In contrast, general translations from foreign languages ​​to Chinese cost only 1,070-1,570 yuan per 1,000 words, and the prices for Chinese-to-foreign-language translations and foreign-language-to-foreign-language translations are 1,490-3,000 yuan. Special translations include some types of translations with special needs, such as legal texts, academic reports, papers, etc.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Can people in the hospital receive these fees?
General expense reporting.answer: Hospital staff cannot receive these fees.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What are the payment standards for case review fees for promotion, re-employment, and new employment?
General expense reporting.answer: The review fee for promotion, renewal and new hire cases is 2,000 to 6,000 yuan per case, or according to the standard of review fees in the "Key Points for Payment of Attendance Fees and Author Fees of Various Agencies and Schools". However, hospital personnel cannot receive this fee.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How much is the introduction fee, commentary fee, and interlocutor fee for major conferences?
General expense reporting.answer: The introduction fee, commentary fee, and interlocutor fee for major conferences are 2,500 yuan per person per session.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to calculate the pricing method of revision and embellishment fees?
General expense reporting.answer: The pricing method of revision and embellishment fees is calculated according to the number of words before revision and embellishment.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the difference between the price of special revision and polishing and general revision and polishing?
General expense reporting.answer: The price of special revision and polishing is different from general revision and polishing. The price of general revision and polishing is between 1,050-2,250 yuan per 1,000 words, while special revision and polishing include French, German, Spanish, Arabic, Portuguese, Russian, Dutch, Southeast Asian, etc., the price per 1,000 words Between 1,650-3,210 yuan. Therefore, the price of special revision and polishing will be relatively higher than that of general revision and polishing.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What if there are unspecified items?
General expense reporting.answer: If you encounter unspecified items, you must handle them according to the regulations in the budget execution manuals of various agencies and units of the central government.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Is the speech fee payment standard calculated according to 2 hours per session?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the speech fee payment standard is calculated according to 2 hours per session.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: The fee for a member of Academia Sinica to be invited to give a speech across institutes is 1,200-2,000 yuan, right?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the fee for a member of Academia Sinica to be invited to give a speech across institutes is 1,200-2,000 yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: The speaking fee for ordinary people outside the Academia Sinica is 2,000-4,000 yuan, is that true?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, speaking fees for ordinary people outside the Academia Sinica are indeed between 2,000 and 4,000 yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: The lecture fee for an academician or an internationally renowned person is 4,000-6,000 yuan, right?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the lecture fee for an academician or an internationally renowned person is between 4,000 and 6,000 yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: The fee range for special lectures is 6,000-20,000 yuan. Does this refer to lectures with academic honors or special nature?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the fee range for special lectures is 6,000-20,000 yuan, which refers to lectures of academic honor or special nature.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Speech fees exceeding 20,000 yuan need special approval, is this the case?
General expense reporting.answer: That's right, speaking fees exceeding 20,000 yuan do require special approval, and in principle, the part exceeding 20,000 yuan should be borne by the private sector.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: In principle, each research institute (department) and center can only spend one series of lectures per year, and the excess needs to be reported to the institute for approval, right?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, each institute and center can only spend one lecture series per year in principle. If this amount is exceeded, it is necessary to report to the Academia Sinica for verification.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: To whom does the hourly fee payment standard for lectures in the hospital regulations apply?
General expense reporting.answer: This hourly payment standard for lectures is applicable to the actual lecturers, including lecturers who hold seminars, symposiums or trainings in various units, as well as lecture assistants who assist in teaching and actually give lectures.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How is the hourly fee calculated for lecture assistants who assist in teaching?
General expense reporting.answer: The hourly fee for lecture assistants who assist in teaching is calculated based on half of the hourly fee for lectures in the same course.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: According to which regulations are the hourly fee payment standards for lectures determined?
General expense reporting.answer: The hourly fee payment standard for lectures is set in accordance with the provisions of Appendix 7 of the Hourly Lecture Fee Payment Table promulgated by the Executive Yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to adjust the hourly fee for lectures to meet the budget and actual needs?
General expense reporting.answer: If you want to adjust the payment amount of the hourly fee for lectures to suit the budget and actual proposals, you can decide the amount of payment within the upper limit of the hourly fee for lectures of Academia Sinica according to the budget situation and actual needs. If it is a special study course, the international or domestic reputation of the lecture, academic status, content of the lecture, and difficulties in recruitment can be considered, and the appropriate amount of payment can be determined after approval by the dean.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: May I ask how long is the teaching time for each session? If there is less than one session, how to calculate the hourly fee?
General expense reporting.answer: Each lesson is 50 minutes. If there is less than one session, the hourly lecture fee will be halved.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to determine the remuneration standard for special lectures?
General expense reporting.answer: The remuneration standards for special lectures can be based on the Academia Sinica's "lecture fee", "translation fee", "promotion, re-employment, new hire case review fee", "major conference introduction fee, comment fee, interlocutor fee" It is determined by the payment standard of "revision and revision fee". At the same time, it is also necessary to consider the relevant conditions such as the reputation of the lecture at home and abroad, academic status, content of the speech, and the difficulty of recruitment to pay the remuneration.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: May I ask how to verify the payment of the transportation expenses and domestic accommodation expenses for external lectures?
General expense reporting.answer: Each unit can verify the transportation expenses and domestic accommodation expenses paid to external lectures according to the actual situation and in accordance with the relevant regulations on travel subsidies.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to pay for teaching materials if lectures need to be written or edited?
General expense reporting.answer: If the lecture needs to write teaching materials, the teaching material fee can be paid according to 70% of the hourly teaching fee.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the upper limit of the hourly lecture fee for externally hired domestic experts and scholars?
General expense reporting.answer: The upper limit of the hourly lecture fee for externally hired domestic experts and scholars is 2,000 yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: . What is the upper limit of the hourly lecture fee for internal staff of Academia Sinica?
General expense reporting.answer: The upper limit of the hourly lecture fee for internal staff of Academia Sinica is 1,000 yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What kind of experts and scholars are recruited by this internal regulation?
General expense reporting.answer: This internal regulation is to recruit domestic and foreign scholars and experts in specific fields or outstanding, and let them participate in important research or management work of Academia Sinica, as well as academic development planning.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What grades are the recruited candidates divided into?
General expense reporting.answer: There are six levels, namely Nobel-level guest lectures, guest lectures and consultants, visiting professors, visiting associate professors, visiting assistant professors and visiting experts.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What are the required documents for applying for expert appointment?
General expense reporting.answer: The materials required to apply for the appointment of experts include the research institute (department) business meeting, the research center business meeting or the appointment consultant of the main department of the institute, the meeting minutes of the guest expert and scholar review group meeting, the appointment manual, the work plan, the certification documents of academic experience (photocopy), The resumes and representative works of the personnel to be hired, as well as other documents that are conducive to review, need to be submitted for review two months before the start date of employment.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How is the review process for the appointment of experts carried out?
General expense reporting.answer:
The review process is divided into the following steps:
1. For the initial and re-appointment of consultants, visiting experts and scholars at all levels in research institutes, research centers and the headquarters of the institute, the appointment period and the amount of remuneration shall be approved by the business meeting of the institute, the business meeting of the research center, or the extension of consultants and guest experts in the headquarters of the institute. Preliminary review by experts and scholars review group meeting.
2. The review team for recruiting consultants, guest experts and scholars in the headquarters is composed of the directors of various units in the headquarters, the accounting office, the personnel office, and the political style office, as well as the executive secretary of the Academic Advisory Association. The secretary-general serves as the convener.
3. After the initial review of the employment extension case, it should be reviewed by the recruitment consultant, guest expert and scholar review team of the hospital. After passing the review, Chen asked the dean to approve the appointment.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How long is the duration of each extension?
General expense reporting.answer: The term of each extension is two years.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to arrange the remuneration and budgetary funds for the extension of experts?
General expense reporting.answer: There are two main arrangements for the remuneration and budgetary expenses of the hired experts. First of all, the remuneration for hired experts is paid in accordance with the provisions of the "Payment Standard Table for Academia Sinica's Recruitment of Consultants, Guest Experts, and Scholars". Secondly, the funds required for the recruitment of experts shall be covered by the budget prepared by the recruiting unit. If the retained specialist is a retired civil servant, the remuneration shall not exceed the statutory basic salary and the total paid employment period shall not exceed six years. However, experts who participate in the important planning and management work of the whole hospital are not subject to this restriction.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the agreement for the hired experts to temporarily leave Taiwan under special circumstances?
General expense reporting.answer: The agreement that the hired experts need to leave Taiwan temporarily under special circumstances is that the accumulative number of days abroad per year shall not exceed three weeks (excluding public holidays), and those whose employment period is less than one year shall be calculated on a pro-rata basis. If the number of days away from Taiwan exceeds three weeks, the corresponding unit should verify the withholding of work remuneration. However, if the research work involved is of a special nature and is really necessary, it can be reported to the hospital for reference after obtaining the consent of the employing unit.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What should I do if there is a change in the employment period?
General expense reporting.answer: If there is a change in the employment term or other changes, it needs to be reported to the Academia Sinica for approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What documents should be signed by the recruiting unit and the experts?
General expense reporting.answer: The recruiting unit and the experts should sign the "Academia Sinica Recruitment Contract for Consultants, Guest Experts and Scholars".

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: . Do visiting fellows receive personal research funding and equipment?
General expense reporting.answer: Visiting staff cannot obtain research funds and equipment alone, but they can jointly implement special research projects of institutions inside and outside the Academia Sinica with full-time researchers of Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: . What should be done if the candidate involved in violation of academic ethics?
General expense reporting.answer: If the candidate involved in the violation of academic ethics, it should be dealt with in accordance with the "Academia Sinica Ethics Committee Setup and Operation Points".

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: . What is the revision and implementation process for this work point?
General expense reporting.answer: The revision and implementation process of this homework point must first be approved by the academic affairs meeting, and then approved by the dean before it can be implemented. The same procedure should be followed when correcting.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How much is the highest daily pay for a Nobel-level guest lecture?
General expense reporting.answer: The highest daily remuneration for a Nobel-level guest lecture is 14,260 yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the maximum monthly remuneration for a visiting professor for a period of more than one year?
General expense reporting.answer: The maximum monthly remuneration is 173,945 yuan for a visiting professor who has served for more than one year.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: May I ask how much a visiting expert who has held the position for more than one year can get paid every month?
General expense reporting.answer: A visiting expert who has held the position for more than one year can get up to 173,945 yuan per month.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Is the cabin class of the guest assistant professor’s air ticket an economy class?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the air ticket for visiting assistant professors is economy class.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the maximum total sum insured for the insurance premiums for personnel recruited abroad?
General expense reporting.answer: The maximum total insurance premium for overseas recruits is NT$4,000,000.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If a person in a position needs to apply for a higher airfare class or subsistence allowance, who does he need to apply to?
General expense reporting.answer: If you need to apply for a higher air ticket class or living allowance, you should apply to the headquarters of Academia Sinica and explain the specific reasons.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How many children under the age of 18 can be subsidized air tickets for a person who has served for more than one year?
General expense reporting.answer: Those who have served for more than one year can subsidize air tickets for up to two children under the age of 18.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the maximum limit of air ticket subsidy for a person who has been employed for more than five years to return home to visit relatives?
General expense reporting.answer: For those who have been employed for more than five years, the maximum air ticket subsidy for returning home to visit relatives is 30,000 yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: For those who have been employed for more than two years, the relocation subsidy is divided into those who are married and those who are single. How much is it in US dollars?
General expense reporting.answer: For those who have been employed for more than two years, the relocation subsidy is US$ 2,000 for those who are married and US$ 1,000 for those who are single.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: .If the recruited personnel are not eligible for insurance and have no other personal insurance, how to apply for international technical cooperation personnel insurance?
General expense reporting.answer: If the recruited personnel are not eligible for insurance and have no other personal insurance, they can ask the recruiting unit to assist in handling international technical cooperation personnel insurance during the employment period.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What's the most you can spend on souvenirs for a departing executive?
General expense reporting.answer: Souvenirs for outgoing executives can cost up to NT$5,000.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How does Academia Sinica subsidize employees' mobile phone communication expenses?
General expense reporting.answer: Academia Sinica subsidizes mobile phone communication fees for employees in accordance with the "Principles for Handling Mobile Phone Communication Fees of the Executive Yuan and its affiliated agencies" and the supplementary regulations of Academia Sinica. Those who bear the mobile phone communication fee include some high-level executives such as the dean and the deputy dean, as well as specific business undertakers. For these objects, Academia Sinica has a certain limit on the amount of subsidy. For example, the dean and vice president are fully subsidized, other supervisors cannot exceed NT$1,000 per month, and exclusive drivers cannot exceed NT$500 per month. If the quota is exceeded due to special business needs, the subsidy must be approved by the dean or his authorized personnel. As for the mobile phone number borne by Academia Sinica, it needs to be registered in the name of Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Who pays the dormitory telephone communication fees of the dean and vice dean?
General expense reporting.answer: The dormitory telephone communication fees of the dean and vice dean are paid by Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Can I apply for a subsidy for residential telephone communication expenses?
General expense reporting.answer: Residential household telephone communication expenses cannot be subsidized.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Who can apply for Academia Sinica's mobile phone communication fee subsidy?
General expense reporting.answer: Academia Sinica subsidizes mobile phone communication fees for the dean, vice president, executive secretary and deputy executive secretary of the Academic Consulting Association, director and deputy director of the research institute, director and deputy director of the preparatory office of the research institute, director, deputy director and secretary general of the research center , Deputy Secretary-General, directors of various departments, offices, and central units, as well as the exclusive driving of the dean, vice-president and secretary-general. Undertakers of special business can also receive subsidies after being approved by the dean of the project signing application or his authorized personnel.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the upper limit of the subsidy for mobile phone calls for each position?
General expense reporting.answer: Full subsidy for mobile phone calls of the dean, vice-president and the secretary-general of the headquarters. Executive secretary and deputy executive secretary of the Academic Consulting Association; director and deputy director of the research institute; director and deputy director of the preparatory office of the research institute; director and deputy director of the research center; The subsidy amount shall not exceed NT$1,000. The monthly subsidy for exclusive driving of the dean, vice-dean and secretary-general shall not exceed NT$500. If the above-mentioned quota is indeed insufficient due to special business, the subsidy may be subsidized after approval by the president or his authorized personnel on a case-by-case basis.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: In what name should the phone number be registered for the mobile phone communication fee subsidy?
General expense reporting.answer: The phone number for the mobile phone communication fee subsidy must be registered in the name of Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Who needs to approve the amendment of this supplementary provision?
General expense reporting.answer: Amendments to this supplementary regulation need to be approved by the president of Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If we want to buy more than 10,000 yuan of art to beautify the environment, do we need to budget it into the annual budget in advance?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, if you want to buy more than 10,000 yuan of artwork to beautify the environment, you need to include it in your annual budget first. After the purchase, it must be included in the property management.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If I need to use my personal credit card to pay official expenses, how should I apply for approval?
General expense reporting.answer: If you need to use a personal credit card to pay official expenses, in special circumstances, you need to report to the special case for approval. During the application process, please detail why you need to pay with your personal credit card. Once approved, you can pay with your personal credit card.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Do I need to report to the court for approval to hold an international conference?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, to hold an international conference, if the venue is outside the hospital, it needs to be reported to the hospital for approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Can I use the hospital fee to pay my membership fee for joining an international society?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, but you need to report to Academia Sinica for approval first.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What should I do if the meal expenses for entertaining important visitors exceed the standard?
General expense reporting.answer: If the meal expenses for entertaining important visitors exceed the standard, you need to report to Academia Sinica and obtain approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Do I need to report for printing publicity materials?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the printing of publicity materials needs to be reported. If you want to print calendars, notebooks or other publicity materials, you need to report to the hospital for approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What materials need to be reported to the hospital for approval when conducting investigation visits?
General expense reporting.answer: The materials that need to be submitted to the hospital for approval when conducting investigations and visits include budget preparation, questionnaires and interview contents, implementation and write-off methods, and other materials.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What information do I need to provide for verification when purchasing gifts or distributing cash?
General expense reporting.answer: When purchasing gifts or distributing cash, it is necessary to provide information such as budget preparation, business promotion plan content, nature, implementation and write-off methods.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How to apply for the interview subsidy for overseas researchers?
General expense reporting.answer: To apply for a subsidy for overseas researchers to return to China for interviews, it is necessary to ask the Academia Sinica for approval when processing the application form. This regulation was adopted in the 769th executive meeting report of the Academia Sinica on September 4, 1996.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Do I need to report to the hospital for approval to hold special lectures?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, special lectures need to be reported to Academia Sinica for approval. If there is more than 1 series of lectures arranged by each institute (center), it must be reported to the institute for approval. In addition, special speech standards may not apply to special projects after approval by the dean.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: . How should the director or director lead a delegation to report for approval?
General expense reporting.answer: When the director or director leads a delegation on a business trip, if he wants to report gifts, communication and miscellaneous expenses, he needs to first determine whether the business trip belongs to leading a delegation, and then report to the hospital for approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: .What should I do if there are special circumstances in the payment standard of the contribution fee?
General expense reporting.answer: If there are special circumstances in the payment standard of the contribution fee, you can explain the reason, and then report the project to the Academia Sinica for approval before processing.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: With regard to internal regulations, how is the balance of the research plan of Academia Sinica allocated and used?
General expense reporting.answer:
According to the regulations of Academia Sinica, the balance of the research plan will be allocated and used in this way: 85% of the balance will be recycled by the project director, 6% will be allocated to the original implementing unit, and the other 9% will be recycled by the hospital . If the program host leaves or retires, 40% of the balance will remain in the institute, while 60% will be used by the institute as a whole.

As for the use of the balance, it is mainly used for projects related to scientific and technological research and development. In terms of management, 85% of the project hosts and 6% of the original executive units will be controlled by the respective research institutes, while 9% of the overall planning by the institute will be controlled by the accounting office. At the end of the project, each research needs to return the balance of the hospital to the hospital.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: After the research project is completed, how is the distribution ratio of the balance fund calculated?
General expense reporting.answer: After the completion of the research project, the distribution ratio of the balance is calculated as follows: the project director can get 85% of the balance for recycling, the original project implementation unit can get 6%, and Academia Sinica will distribute 9% as a whole. However, if the program host leaves or retires, 40% of the balance will be kept in the unit, and the remaining 60% will be used by Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: After the project host leaves or retires, what should I do with the balance?
General expense reporting.answer: When the program host leaves or retires, 40% of the balance will remain in the original implementing unit, and the remaining 60% will be used by Academia Sinica as a whole. If you are still implementing external subsidies or entrusting special projects after retirement, you can apply to your unit for processing after the end of the project.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What technological research and development-related projects can the balance of the research plan be used for?
General expense reporting.answer: The balance of the research plan can be used for projects related to technological research and development, and the specific use method will be determined in accordance with the regulations and needs of the Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Which units are responsible for the management of the balance, and how to control it?
General expense reporting.answer: The management of the balance is divided into two parts, one part is 85% of the plan host and 6% of the original executive unit, and this part is controlled by the special account set up by each research institute or center. The other part is the 9% balance fund coordinated by the hospital, which is controlled by a special account set up by the accounting office.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What procedures are required to amend this principle?
General expense reporting.answer: If this principle is to be amended, it needs to be reported and approved by the head of the department, and then submitted to the dean for approval. The revised principles will take effect.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Can employee travel expenses be paid by personal credit card?
General expense reporting.answer: Employee travel expenses can be paid by personal credit card.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Is it possible to pay with a personal credit card when purchasing books online?
General expense reporting.answer: You can pay with your personal credit card when purchasing books online.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If I need to have dinner with foreign guests, can I use my personal credit card to pay less than 20,000 yuan?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, if you have a meal with foreign guests due to business needs, and the cost is less than NT$20,000, you can pay with your personal credit card.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How should I report if there is a special situation where I need to pay official expenses with my personal credit card?
General expense reporting.answer: If you need to use your personal credit card to pay official expenses under special circumstances, you should report the case to Academia Sinica first, and then proceed with the approval.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Should I apply for a government procurement card in order to avoid non-compliance with personal credit card payments?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, in order to avoid using a personal credit card to pay in violation of the regulations, you should apply for a government procurement card.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the difference between the expenditure account allocation table and the expenditure agency allocation table?
General expense reporting.answer: Expenditure account apportionment table means that when a repayment needs to be apportioned by multiple projects or subjects within the agency, and the expense vouchers cannot be separated. The expenditure agency apportionment table refers to the situation that when a repayment needs to be shared by multiple agencies, it is necessary to make this table regardless of whether the expenditure vouchers can be separated.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How is the number of copies for making the apportionment form determined?
General expense reporting.answer: The number of copies of the apportionment table is determined according to the number of apportionment subjects or apportionment agencies. For example, if there are 3 subjects (or 3 institutions) to share, it is necessary to make 3 allocation tables.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: May I ask which apportionment form should the original documents of the whole case be attached to?
General expense reporting.answer: When the original voucher of the whole case is in the allocation table of expenditure items, it should be attached to the work plan of No. 1 or the sticky receipt of expenditure vouchers on the purpose-specific subject. In the general case of the apportionment table of the expenditure agency, it should be attached to the expenditure certificate sticky deposit slip of the sponsoring agency. And if it involves the subsidy plan of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture, the original copy of the original voucher must be attached to the sticky deposit slip of the expenditure certificate of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Is it necessary to attach the original receipt to the apportionment form of the expenditure agency to handle the write-off?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the expenditure agency allocation form needs to be accompanied by the original receipt for verification. But if it is shared with the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture, since the Academia Sinica usually does not issue a receipt, it can be written off as long as the apportionment form of the expenditure agency is attached.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If it involves subsidy programs of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture, where should the original voucher be attached?
General expense reporting.answer: If it involves the subsidy plan of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture, the original original voucher should be attached to the sticky deposit slip of the expenditure certificate of the Ministry of Science and Technology or the Council of Agriculture.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What are the relevant regulations that need to be followed when printing weekly, monthly, annual calendars, notebooks or other promotional materials?
General expense reporting.answer:
When printing weekly, monthly, annual calendars, notebooks or other promotional materials, the following rules need to be followed:
1. It should be handled after drawing up the relevant budget, and should not be spent by other funds.
2. It must conform to the effectiveness of business promotion.
3. Clearly regulate the distribution objects, properly estimate the number of prints and record them for management.
4. Items with value or stored value are not allowed to be printed, such as postage stamps, phone cards, etc.
5. It needs to be reported to the hospital for approval before it can be processed.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Regarding this briefing session, did we not provide snacks and bento?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, according to the documents of Academia Sinica, this time the explanatory meeting will not provide snacks and lunches in order to save public expenditure.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If I am an academician in mainland China, how much is the air ticket and remuneration for attending the academician meeting?
General expense reporting.answer: If you are an academician in mainland China, the air ticket to attend the academician meeting will subsidize the business class round-trip air ticket. As for remuneration, a one-time fixed payment of NT$68,000 was given.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Will the remuneration be different if I participate in the pre-session seminar of the academician meeting?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, the remuneration for attending a pre-session seminar is different from the remuneration for attending a fellowship meeting. If you participate in the pre-symposium, the one-time remuneration is NT$30,000; if you are an academician from the mainland, a foreign country or an academician outside Taibei City, the one-time remuneration is NT$46,000.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: For foreign academicians who are invited to the academy to guide research, how to calculate the air ticket and remuneration?
General expense reporting.answer: For foreign academicians who are invited to the institute to guide their research, they will be subsidized for round-trip business class air tickets in terms of air tickets, and they need to verify the reimbursement. Remuneration (including living expenses) shall be paid within the scope of the "Maximum Standards for Payment of Foreign Consultants, Experts, and Scholars Employed by Various Agencies to Work in Taiwan" stipulated by the Executive Yuan.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: If it happens that the ticket needs to be refunded or exchanged due to a change in the itinerary, do you need a special signature for approval?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, if the ticket needs to be returned or exchanged due to changes in the itinerary, the subsidy can only be obtained after the project is signed and approved.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: How much are councilors from mainland China or abroad paid when they participate in the council?
General expense reporting.answer: When members from mainland China or foreign countries participate in the council, the one-time fixed remuneration is NT$24,000.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Is there any subsidy for overseas candidate research and research technicians to return to China for interviews?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, Academia Sinica will provide subsidies for overseas candidate research and research technicians to return to China for interviews as appropriate.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What are the restrictions on job titles?
General expense reporting.answer: The job title limit for applicants is higher than assistant researcher and research technician.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Who are the main candidates for the subsidy?
General expense reporting.answer: The objects of the subsidy are mainly for research and research technicians who are candidates from overseas.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Does the candidate need to give a presentation in the interview?
General expense reporting.answer: Yes, candidates are required to give the required presentation during the interview.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: What is the basis for determining the standard of the subsidy fee?
General expense reporting.answer: The standard of the subsidy fee is determined according to the proposed job title and according to the payment standard table for consultants, visiting experts and scholars hired by the Academia Sinica.

General expense reporting.title: Court regulations
General expense reporting.question: Which unit is responsible for these subsidy costs?
General expense reporting.answer: These subsidies are borne by the employer.

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Is this point aimed at standardizing the subsidy of expenses related to the central government sending personnel to participate in various domestic trainings or seminars?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, the main point is to standardize the subsidy of expenses related to the central government sending personnel to participate in various domestic training or lectures.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Do training institutions need to provide accommodation facilities?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The training institution needs to provide necessary accommodation according to the course arrangement, the distance of the trainees, and the traffic conditions. If the training institution does not have accommodation facilities, it should contact other training institutions to borrow or entrust to provide accommodation.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can the service organization subsidize the transportation and accommodation expenses of the trainees?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The service organization may, according to the actual situation, subsidize the trainees' transportation and accommodation expenses between the service organization and the training place. However, if the training institution has already provided transportation or accommodation, no subsidy will be given.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training institution has already provided transportation or accommodation, can I still apply for the subsidy?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training organization has already provided transport or accommodation, then it is not possible to apply for a subsidy.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can I also apply for subsidies for transportation and accommodation expenses for seminars, symposiums, etc.?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, you can apply for a subsidy for transportation and accommodation expenses for seminars, symposiums, etc., in accordance with the provisions of points 3 and 4.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can each agency formulate subsidy regulations on its own according to business needs?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Each agency may, based on business or other considerations, formulate subsidy regulations on its own within the scope of this key point for verification and discretion.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Are the old and new regulations applicable in different periods?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, the old and new regulations will apply at different times. If a training or workshop period spans the old and new rules, the old rule applies during the old rule and the new rule applies during the new rule.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Executive Yuan Regulations
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Does this point also apply to subsidies for domestic training or lectures sent by state-owned enterprises and local governments?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, the subsidy for sending personnel from state-owned enterprises to participate in domestic training or lectures must also follow this point. Local governments can refer to this point to formulate their own regulations, and if they have not formulated regulations, they should follow this point.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What is the difference between the nature and basis of sending personnel to participate in training or lectures and being sent on business trips in the Executive Yuan’s Explanatory Compilation?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The nature and basis of being sent to a training or workshop is very different from that of a mission. Sending personnel to participate in training or seminars is based on the regulations on expenses reported by various agencies for sending personnel to participate in various trainings or lectures, referring to the stipulated standards for the main points of domestic business travel expenses, and approving one-half of the round-trip transportation expenses, accommodation expenses, and meals and miscellaneous expenses One for meals. The dispatched domestic business trip is handled according to the key points of domestic business trip travel expenses. Therefore, the nature and basis of the two are different, and there is no competition.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I apply for training by myself, can I report the transportation expenses and food and miscellaneous expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you apply for the training by yourself, since it is not a training arranged by the agency, you can no longer report the transportation expenses and meal miscellaneous expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I am sent to domestic colleges and universities for advanced studies, can I receive travel expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you are sent to domestic colleges and universities for advanced studies, whether you can receive travel expenses depends on the regulations of your service organization. For example, if the training institution has provided more than two meals and accommodation every day, it can only subsidize round-trip transportation expenses. If the training institution does not provide accommodation, your service institution can subsidize round-trip transportation, accommodation and meals for you according to the actual situation. In short, you must follow the relevant regulations of your institution.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Concerning the doubts about the use of "Key Points for Domestic Travel Expense Claims" and "Key Points for Subsidizing Expenses for Various Domestic Training or Lectures", how do you clarify the difference between standard employees and agencies?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer:
As for the doubts about the use of "points for domestic travel expenses reimbursement" and "points for subsidies for sending personnel to participate in various domestic training or lectures", we can clarify the difference between standard employees and institutions from the following two points:

1. "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Trips" and "Key Points for Subsidizing Expenses for Various Domestic Trainings or Lectures" are mainly to regulate employees of various organs. Expenditure regulations.

2. In the letter of the Executive Yuan on December 22, 103, it was aimed at various meetings and trainings for agencies. If it is not possible to do it at a public venue or a training institution due to insufficient space, the institution will review the expenditure standard of the relevant expenses based on this when evaluating whether it is necessary to provide meals for the participants.

Combining the above two points, it can be seen that these regulations regulate the two different subjects of "employees" and "organizations". Therefore, employees of various agencies participate in various conferences and lectures and trainings, no matter where they are located in public venues or training institutions, they should follow the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Travel" and "Key Points for Subsidizing Expenses for Various Domestic Trainings or Lectures Sending Personnel from Various Agencies" regulations.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: I would like to ask if the accommodation equipment of the training institution that the employees participate in is entrusted to a specific hotel, can they choose not to stay and apply for accommodation subsidy according to the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Travel"?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: No, because the nature of "domestic business trip" and "domestic training or lecture" are different. Business trips are to perform certain tasks, and the required expenses are borne by the government; training or lectures are in the nature of public holidays, and the government only provides partial subsidies, and the insufficient part needs to be borne by employees themselves. Therefore, if employees choose not to live in the hotel arranged by the training institution, they should handle the accommodation problem by themselves and cannot apply for accommodation subsidy from the institution.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training period does not exceed 5 days, can the training institution provide lunch expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training period does not exceed 5 days, the training institution may decide whether to provide lunch according to the actual situation, but shall not subsidize the meal expenses of the trainees.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training exceeds 5 days and the training institution does not provide accommodation, what should we do?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training exceeds 5 days and the training institution does not provide accommodation, they should consult or entrust other training institutions to provide accommodation. If the training institution is still unable to provide accommodation, your service institution can subsidize the accommodation fee according to the actual situation, but it must be within the daily limit, and relevant accommodation fee vouchers must be provided.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can people who participate in training at night receive transportation subsidies?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Those who participate in training at night can receive transportation subsidies. Because as long as the training is arranged by the service organization, there is a training notification document, and you have really participated in the training, you can apply for round-trip transportation subsidies. Even if the training is done at night, there is no need to ask for leave and you can still receive subsidies.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can the job agent during the training period get overtime pay or compensatory leave and round-trip transportation expenses when handling urgent official duties?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: During the training period, when the agent returns to school on the second day of the week to work overtime to deal with urgent official duties, he can claim the round-trip transportation expenses according to the regulations. However, in terms of overtime pay or compensatory leave, this text does not explicitly mention it.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I travel from Chiayi to Kaohsiung for training, how will the transportation cost be calculated?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you start from Chiayi to Kaohsiung for training, the transportation fee will be reported according to the actual transportation, such as plane, high-speed rail, train, car, etc. Therefore, you only need to report the transportation expenses according to the actual amount spent.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I travel from the residence to the training center, can the transportation expenses be reimbursed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you go from the residence to the training platform, because it is on the way and can save public funds, so if there is no transportation fee actually incurred, you don’t need to report it again.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I did not apply for accommodation, can my daily round-trip transportation and meals be reimbursed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you have not applied for accommodation, the part of the transportation expenses can be reimbursed for the round-trip transportation expenses between the service institution and the training institution before and after participating in the training. However, if you choose not to have board and lodging when you investigate your needs, the board cannot be claimed from the service and therefore cannot be claimed.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I voluntarily give up my board and lodging in the training institution, can I still claim the board and lodging expenses from the service organization?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you voluntarily give up your board and lodging at the training institution, you will not be able to claim the board and lodging expenses from the service organization. However, as for the transportation expenses, you can still apply for a subsidy for the round-trip transportation expenses from the service organization to the training institution before and after you participate in the training.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: During the training or lecture period, according to what regulations will the service organization subsidize our transportation expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: During the training or lecture period, the service agency will subsidize your transportation expenses between the service agency and the training institution on the day of departure and return in accordance with the provisions of point 3 of the "Key Points for Subsidizing the Expenses of Various Institutions Sending Personnel to Participate in Domestic Training or Lectures".
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If you come from afar to participate in the training, and investigate the trainees' willingness to provide board and lodging, how should the board and lodging be reimbursed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the trainees come from far away to participate in the training, the training institution will ask the trainees whether they need accommodation when investigating the accommodation needs of the trainees. If the trainee chooses not to use the board and lodging, he is voluntarily giving up the right to board and lodging, so he cannot claim the board and lodging fee from the service agency. As for the transportation expenses, only the round-trip transportation expenses from the service organization to the training institution before and after the training can be claimed, and other expenses will not be subsidized. Therefore, the cost of board and lodging shall be reimbursed according to the choice of the trainee and the above principles.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I still need to go back to the service organization to work after the weekly training, and go to the training organization next week, how will the transportation subsidy be calculated?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you have to return to work in the service organization after the training every week, and then go to the training institution next week, this situation is similar to the situation in which the trainees return to the service organization to handle official duties during the training period. Therefore, according to the actual situation, your service agency can subsidize the transportation expenses between the service agency and the training institution after the return date. If your local council has its own rules, follow those rules.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training institution does not provide accommodation, can the service institution subsidize our daily round-trip transportation expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training institution does not provide accommodation, according to regulations, the service institution will only subsidize the transportation expenses for the total of 2 trips on the departure and return days before and after the training or lecture. However, if there is an urgent official business that needs to be returned to the agency for processing, the agency can additionally subsidize the round-trip transportation expenses. As for accommodation, it is necessary to provide accommodation or subsidize accommodation fees based on a comprehensive assessment of training course arrangements, distance and round-trip traffic conditions.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the two-day round-trip ticket price is cheaper than the outbound transportation fee, accommodation fee and return transportation fee on the first day, can I claim the two-day one-day round-trip ticket price?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, according to regulations, if the two-day round-trip ticket price is cheaper than the outbound transportation fee, accommodation fee on the first day and the return transportation fee on the second day, you can claim the two-day one-day round-trip ticket price. The regulation does not distinguish whether the training institution provides accommodation or whether the service institution subsidizes the accommodation fee. As long as the requirements are met, subsidies are available based on the certificates provided by the trainees. However, if the training institution has provided the necessary accommodation and the trainee chooses not to stay, the accommodation fee will not be subsidized.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: During the basic training period, if the agency requires me to go back to participate in the badminton match and then return to the training place, can I apply for the high-speed rail transportation subsidy?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you are participating in a badminton match on behalf of the agency and have the fact that you have to take transportation, then the agency can subsidize your transportation expenses between the service agency and the training agency according to the subsidy points. Alternatively, the agency can also pay for it under its annual budget for cultural and recreational activities. Therefore, you can apply for high-speed rail transportation subsidies.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can I get the transportation fee to the training institution while going to the training on the public holiday on the day of my appointment?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, you can receive the transportation fee to the training institution while going to the training on the public holiday on the day of taking office. According to the provisions of the "Key Points for Subsidizing the Expenses of All Organizations Sending Personnel to Participate in Various Domestic Trainings or Lectures", the service organization can subsidize your transportation expenses. However, this still needs to be based on the regulations of your service agency, so it is recommended that you confirm the specific method with them.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: During the training period, the agency has already provided board and lodging and the previous day’s accommodation. After the training, can the trainees claim for round-trip transportation expenses, one-day accommodation fees and board and miscellaneous expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Regarding the question you mentioned, according to relevant regulations, if the training institution has provided more than two meals and accommodation per day during the training or lecture period, the service institution only needs to subsidize the round-trip transportation expenses. On the day of the end of the training, if the training institution does not provide accommodation, it means that the training does not need to provide accommodation on the day of the end of the training. The service organization of the trainees can consider the actual situation and decide whether it is necessary to pay for accommodation and meals. In addition, in terms of reimbursement, the service agency needs to consider the nature of the training and evaluate whether it is necessary to stay again after completing the training, and the trainees should report the relevant expenses according to the actual situation. Each agency can also formulate internal regulations within the prescribed scope and strictly implement them according to its own business characteristics or other factors.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Does this service help to subsidize the expenses of agency personnel participating in various trainings or lectures?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, this service is mainly to help subsidize some expenses of government personnel who participate in domestic training or lectures. However, it should be noted that if the training institution has already provided board and lodging, no subsidy is required; if the training institution does not provide board and lodging due to course arrangements or trainees’ journey, no subsidy is required in this case. As for the meal allowance, it has been cancelled.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can the handling fee for remittance transfer of accommodation expenses be included in the travel expenses?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the handling fee for remittance and transfer of accommodation expenses is on a business trip, it can be included in the miscellaneous expenses of the travel expenses, but it cannot be double-reported. However, in the case of participating in training or lectures, the handling fee does not belong to the subsidy category and cannot be included in the travel expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Should I apply for a public holiday or a business trip to participate in seminars, symposiums and other activities?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Participation in seminars, symposiums and other activities of the nature of training or lectures shall be granted official leave in accordance with the leave rules for civil servants. If participating in these activities is assigned by the agency to perform certain tasks, then a tolerance will be given. As for the payment of expenses, it should be treated as a public holiday or tolerance and handled in accordance with the corresponding regulations. However, local governments or agencies can also formulate their own internal regulations within a certain standard range based on factors such as financial resources and business characteristics.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: In terms of expense reporting, should the calculation be based on the "points for subsidizing expenses for personnel sent by various agencies to participate in various domestic trainings or lectures" or "points for reporting expenses for domestic business trips"?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Expenses should be reported according to the nature of the activities to be participated in. If it is a public holiday, it should be calculated according to the "points for subsidizing the expenses of various domestic training or lectures sent by various agencies"; Points" to calculate. However, each local government or agency (institution) may, based on financial resources, business characteristics or other considerations, formulate internal regulations within the above-mentioned standards.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can local governments or agencies set their own payment standards according to the actual situation?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, each local government or agency may, based on financial resources, business characteristics or other considerations, formulate internal regulations within relevant regulations and standards.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
