Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: How does the Executive Yuan Interpretation Compilation determine whether various meetings are of the nature of training lectures?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The Compilation of the Executive Yuan’s Interpretation stated that to judge whether various meetings are of the nature of training lectures, it can be determined according to the instructions in the training letter or meeting notice issued by the sponsoring organization, or by the service organization of the participants themselves to measure the actual situation.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What content should the organizer indicate on the training letter or meeting notice to determine the nature?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The sponsoring agency needs to indicate in the training letter or meeting notice that activities such as seminars and symposiums are of the nature of training lectures, so that the service agency of the participants can determine the nature of the activity according to the actual situation.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the service agency decides on its own based on the actual situation, is there any suggestion or standard that can be referred to?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: As for the service agency to determine whether the seminar and other activities are of the nature of training lectures based on the actual situation, you can refer to the instructions on the training letter or meeting notice issued by the sponsoring agency. In addition, it can be judged based on the content, purpose, and participants of the activity. If it involves learning new knowledge, skills, or professional exchanges, etc., and helps the participants improve their work, it can be identified as a training lecture Activity.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can I claim the incidental expenses for my business trip to attend the seminar?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the seminar you attend is not of the nature of lecture training, and the agency approves that you participate in a business trip, then your miscellaneous expenses can be reimbursed. It is right to follow the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Travel".
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can the incidental expenses be claimed for two or three days of seminars, workshops, and briefings held by educational institutions or schools on a business trip?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: cannot. According to regulations, after participating in such activities, there will be a study note indicating the number of study hours, and the participants are considered students, so they cannot report miscellaneous expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: When civil servants are sent to participate in training or lectures, should they be classified as business trips or public holidays?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: When public servants participate in training or lectures, if they meet the reasons for official leave listed in Article 4 of the Rules for Requesting Leave for Public Servants and are of a tolerance nature, or they are dispatched by the agency and meet the regulations on official leave, they will be registered as official leave and marked with tolerance nature. If you have any doubts, you can ask the service agency to handle it according to the above regulations, or you can contact the Accounting and Accounting Office of the Executive Yuan.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If employees sign up for seminars or seminars by themselves, can they claim transportation and accommodation expenses according to the regulations?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If employees sign up for seminars or seminars by themselves, they cannot claim transportation and accommodation expenses according to the regulations. Because this regulation is for employees dispatched by the agency to participate in training or lectures. Therefore, if you participate by yourself, you cannot apply for related fee subsidies.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I want to sign up for the training quota held by the Human Resources Development Institute of the General Office of Personnel and Administration of the Executive Yuan, can I enjoy public holidays, transportation and accommodation subsidies?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If you sign up for the training quota organized by the Human Resources Development Institute of the General Office of Personnel and Administration of the Executive Yuan, you will not be entitled to public holidays, transportation, and accommodation subsidies because you are not designated by the agency in accordance with relevant administrative procedures.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If I attend a full-day or half-day seminar, as well as a meeting of another institution, will my travel expenses be reimbursed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer:
If you participate in full-day or half-day seminars and meetings of other organizations, the travel expense reimbursement depends on the situation. If the training is registered as a public holiday and does not have the nature of a business trip, the travel expenses cannot be paid, but it belongs to the nature of training lecture expenses. If the training institution does not provide board and lodging, you can get subsidies when you need to pay for it yourself.

As for the part of attending the meeting, it should be judged whether it has the nature of tolerance according to the business characteristics of the organization you belong to. If it is a business trip, you can claim the travel expenses in accordance with the "Key Points for Claiming Travel Expenses for Domestic Business Trips"; if there is no nature of tolerance, you cannot claim the travel expenses. So the specific situation needs to be measured by your service organization.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Is participating in these activities considered a public holiday or a business trip?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: To participate in these activities, if you are attending a seminar or a meeting of another agency, you need to first judge whether it has the nature of tolerance. If it has the nature of a business trip, it can be counted as a business trip and registered as a business trip, so that the travel expenses can be paid according to the key points for domestic business trip travel expenses. If there is no nature of tolerance, it can only be treated as a public holiday, and travel expenses cannot be paid. So whether it is a public holiday or a business trip, it should be judged according to the specific situation.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training institution does not provide accommodation, can I get a subsidy for the accommodation fee?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, if the training provider is supposed to provide accommodation but does not, then you will be able to get assistance with the cost of accommodation if you need to pay for it yourself.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What are the specific identification criteria for employee business trips?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The specific identification standard for employees on business trips is to see whether they handle general official duties or specific work plans, and register as official (trip) business trips or add the nature of business trips in official holidays. Only employees who meet these conditions can receive travel expenses in accordance with the provisions of the key points for domestic travel expenses reporting.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If the training or lecture exceeds 5 days, will the training institution provide accommodation?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training or lecture exceeds 5 days, the training institution will provide accommodation, unless there are special circumstances. If the training institution does not have accommodation facilities, it is the responsibility to find other training institutions for assistance.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can seminars, symposiums and other activities also enjoy this treatment?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, activities such as seminars and symposiums can also enjoy this treatment, because they are activities of the nature of training or lectures, and can be handled similarly.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What if the training institution does not have accommodation facilities?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If the training institution does not have accommodation facilities, it should consult or entrust other training institutions to provide accommodation.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can I apply for meal and incidental expenses for a 1-day meeting?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Those who attend the 1-day conference cannot apply for meal expenses, but they can apply for miscellaneous expenses. The daily limit for miscellaneous expenses is 400 yuan. Specific reporting requirements shall be handled in accordance with the regulations of each service agency.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What is the maximum incidental expense limit for a one-day business trip?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The upper limit of incidental expenses for one-day travel is 400 yuan.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can each agency set its own regulations on reimbursement according to the characteristics of its business?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, each agency can formulate its own reimbursement regulations within the prescribed scope based on business characteristics or other factors.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can civil servants participating in the seminar apply for business trip registration and meal reimbursement?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Public servants participating in the lectures cannot apply for business trip registration and meal reimbursement, because there is a clear difference between business trips and public holidays. They should verify the payment according to the "Key Points for Subsidizing the Expenses of Various Institutions Sending Personnel to Participate in Various Domestic Trainings or Lectures". However, the agency can formulate its own internal regulations to deal with it according to its own financial resources or other factors within the prescribed range.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Do we have to apply for board and lodging expenses when re-attending trainings such as recommending civil servants for promotion to official appointments?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: When re-participating in trainings such as recommending civil servants for promotion to briefing officers, you have to pay for the training at your own expense, and you cannot apply for board and lodging expenses. Regardless of whether the training institution provides board and lodging, you have to pay for the training expenses yourself.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Can daily-paid temporary personnel employed by various agencies be sent on business trips or to participate in training seminars?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, daily paid temporary personnel employed by various agencies can be sent on business trips or to participate in training seminars, but the suitability of the use should be checked according to the "Key Points for the Employment and Use of Temporary Personnel by the Executive Yuan and its affiliated agencies and schools". If it is really necessary to send a business trip or participate in training seminars, the relevant expenses can be reimbursed in accordance with the regulations.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If temporary personnel need to be dispatched on business trips, which regulations do they refer to for their expense reporting standards?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: If temporary personnel need to be dispatched on business trips, their expense reimbursement standards refer to the reimbursement standards for personnel below the recommended level in the "Amount of Travel Expenditure Claims for Domestic Travel Expenses for Civil Service Employees of Central Organs".
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: Temporary personnel who participate in training seminars, according to which regulations should the expenses be verified?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: For temporary personnel participating in training seminars, the expense report shall be verified in accordance with the "Regulations on Expense Reporting Expenses for Personnel from Various Agencies to Participate in Various Trainings or Lectures".
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: What factors do agencies and local governments need to consider to formulate relevant norms when handling travel expenses or training and seminar expenses reimbursement?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: When handling travel expenses or training and lecture expenses, various agencies and local governments need to consider actual needs, budgetary quotas, and financial conditions to formulate relevant regulations.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: May I ask if the relevant expenses for the education and training conducted by the agency itself cannot be included in the "education and training expenses"?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, the expenses related to education and training handled by the agency itself cannot be listed as "education and training expenses". It should be classified into other secondary purpose subjects under the operating expenses according to the nature of expenditure.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If an employee wants to study courses at a school or training institution at home and abroad, what expenses will be included in the "education and training fee"?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The education and training fee will include credit fees, miscellaneous fees, teaching materials, board and lodging, transportation and other related expenses required for employees to go to domestic and foreign schools or training institutions to study courses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: How should the relevant expenses for education and training handled by the agency be classified and listed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The expenses related to the education and training conducted by the agency itself shall be classified and listed in the other secondary purposes under the item of business expenses according to the nature of the expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: In which secondary-purpose category should the expenses required for self-management of employee education and training be listed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The expenses required for self-management of employee education and training shall be listed in other secondary-purpose subjects (such as part-time fees, utilities, etc.) under the item of business expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: If employees are sent to training institutions for training, the expenses should be included in the education and training expenses, right?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: Yes, if employees are sent to training institutions for training, the expenses should be listed in the education and training expenses item under business expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: In which budget item should the fees for entrusting other agencies to organize specific training courses be placed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: The cost of entrusting other agencies to conduct specific training courses should be included in the budget item "Appointment Expenses" under the item of business expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

Subsidies for sending personnel from var.title: Compilation of Interpretations by the Executive Yuan
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.question: How should the employee training expenses for the entrusted development of the information system be listed?
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.answer: How to list the expenses for the training of employees commissioned to develop the information system depends on whether the training is capitalized. If there is capitalization, it will be listed according to the provisions of capitalization; if there is no capitalization, it will be listed according to the general operating expenses.
Subsidies for sending personnel from var.category: Subsidies for sending personnel from various agencies to participate in various domestic training or lectures

accounting business.title: Court regulations
accounting business.question: How is the annual budget allocation and reserved allocation carried out?
accounting business.answer: The annual budget allocation and reserved allocation are the part-time accountants of each institute (center) responsible for preparing the annual revenue (outgoing) distribution budget provisional amount table, annual revenue (outgoing) budget allocation table, and annual expenditure reserved allocation table, and inputting the distribution data system. These forms are then compiled by the accounting office, signed and printed, and sent to the payment office and the presidential palace.

accounting business.title: Court regulations
accounting business.question: What procedures should be paid attention to in the procurement supervision operation?
accounting business.answer:
The following procedures should be paid attention to in the procurement supervision operation:

1. Handle budget control: the part-time accountants of each office (center) need to ensure that the budget is sufficient and control the use of funds.

2. Review the contract draft: the part-time accountants or the accounting office of each office (center) need to carefully review the contract draft to ensure that the terms meet the legal requirements.

3. Handle supervision operations according to different procurement types:
  (1) For cases where the Government Procurement Law is applicable, the Accounting Office may need to assign personnel to supervise the handling, and the procurement shall be carried out in accordance with the Procurement Measures of the Chief Accountant of the Agency and Related Units in Collaboration with the Supervision and Handling of Procurement.
  (2) For scientific research procurement announcement bidding cases, the part-time accountants or accounting offices of each institute (center) must follow the precautions for supervision and handling of scientific and technological research and development procurement announcement bidding cases of Academia Sinica.
  (3) Applicable to scientific research procurement and direct procurement cases, the accountants or accounting offices of each institute (center) only need to review the draft contract.

Finally, ensure that all procedures are followed to avoid violations.

accounting business.title: Court regulations
accounting business.question: What is the difference between scientific research procurement announcement bidding cases and scientific research procurement direct procurement cases?
accounting business.answer: The main difference between scientific research procurement announcement bidding cases and scientific research procurement direct procurement cases lies in the procurement process. The public bidding case requires public bidding when a certain amount is reached, allowing various manufacturers to bid and compete, and select the most suitable manufacturer for cooperation. In the case of direct procurement, when the amount is relatively small, you can directly cooperate with the designated manufacturer without going through the process of public bidding.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: What is Procurement Supervision?
accounting business.answer: The procurement supervision operation is actually a fund review business, mainly to review and manage the process and amount of purchasing goods and services.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: What is the process of auditing the expense report?
accounting business.answer: There are two steps in the process of approving the expense report. First of all, the part-time accountants of each office (center) are responsible for sorting out, summarizing and initially reviewing the sticky deposit slips of original vouchers, and issuing subpoenas after printing. Then, the Accounting Office is responsible for the after-the-fact audit of all the sticky receipts of original vouchers that occurred in the previous month.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: What documents are required for program closure?
accounting business.answer: Relevant documents such as income and expenditure statements, expenditure vouchers, etc. are required for the planned closing operation.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: What are the contents of payment vouchers, revenue, custody and property accounting operations?
accounting business.answer: Payment vouchers, annual revenue, custodian funds and property accounting operations include the opening of transfer application forms, review of expenditure recovery documents, receipts, payment documents and property increase and decrease documents, etc., as well as the processing of reply forms and corrections matter. The Accounting Office is responsible for transferring payment vouchers, uploading them to GBA to convert payment vouchers and subpoenas, and handling electronic payment transmission operations after printing.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: How is the collection account operation carried out?
accounting business.answer: The receivables accounting operation is divided into two parts. First of all, the part-time accountants of each office (center) are responsible for issuing income and expenditure subpoenas and reviewing the difference explanation form. Then, according to the audited collection monthly statement, the collection account staff in the accounting office transfers the monthly balance data of each office to the collection account according to the special plan, general collection and temporary payment.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: What changes have been made to the announced amount after the revision of the Government Procurement Law?
accounting business.answer: The amount announced after the revision of the Government Procurement Law has increased. For the specific amount, please refer to the Order No. 1110100798 of the Engineering Council on December 23, 2011.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: If the batch or partial acceptance amount does not reach the announced amount, can we not notify the supervisory unit?
accounting business.answer: Yes, if the batch or partial acceptance amount does not reach the announced amount, and has been approved by the head of the agency or the authorized person, there is no need to notify the supervisory unit. However, if the batch or partial acceptance amount exceeds the announced amount, or meets other regulations, the supervisory unit must still be notified.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: How does the supervisory business work?
accounting business.answer: The supervision and handling business is mainly carried out by the Accounting Office and the Political Affairs Office of the Academia Sinica, and they will allocate work according to the contractor and amount of the procurement case. These supervision personnel will conduct on-site supervision or written review to ensure the smooth progress of the bid opening and acceptance procedures for scientific research procurement. However, they will not review substantive or technical matters related to vendor qualifications, specifications, etc. After the supervisory office is completed, they have to sign the record and send it out after all relevant personnel have signed it. Of course, under some special circumstances, the supervisory unit may not personally send personnel to supervise, such as written or electronic bidding, and the batch acceptance amount does not reach NT$1.5 million.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: How long do I need to notify the supervisory unit before the bid opening?
accounting business.answer: You need to notify the supervisory unit three days before the bid opening or acceptance.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: Which procurement cases will the Accounting Office and the Political Affairs Office be responsible for?
accounting business.answer: The Accounting Office and the Political Affairs Office will be responsible for the announcement bidding cases of the Academia Sinica headquarters, as well as the supervision of the announcement bidding cases handled by various institutes, divisions, and centers with an amount exceeding NT$1,500,000.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: What are the responsibilities of supervisory personnel in the process of bid opening and acceptance?
accounting business.answer: In the process of bid opening and acceptance, supervisory personnel need to observe on-site or conduct written review together with the supervisory office to ensure that the process of bid opening and acceptance of scientific research procurement is carried out correctly. However, they are not required to review substantive or technical matters of procurement involving vendor qualifications, specifications, commercial terms, reserve price setting, conditions of award and methods of acceptance. After the supervision is over, they need to sign the record, and it is completed after all relevant personnel have signed. If there are any questions or comments, they need to be recorded and reported to the head of the purchasing unit for decision.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: Under what circumstances, the supervisory unit may not send personnel to supervise the handling?
accounting business.answer:
The supervisory unit may not send personnel to supervise the handling under the following circumstances:
1. Conduct bidding and acceptance procedures in written or electronic means
2. For batch or partial acceptance, the acceptance amount does not reach NT$1,500,000
3. It is difficult to supervise and accept on-site supervision and acceptance if it is ready-to-use or the period from supply to use is very short
4. The number of bidders does not meet the requirements stipulated in the bidding documents or the bid is rejected due to no bidders
5. There are important official duties to be dealt with, and there is no staff available for assignment
6. Other circumstances approved by the supervisor of the supervisory unit.

accounting business.title: Supervision business
accounting business.question: After completing the supervision, what procedures do the supervisors need to carry out?
accounting business.answer: After the supervision is completed, the supervisor needs to sign the record, and it will not be considered complete until all relevant personnel have signed. If the moderator or chief inspector does not accept the opinion of the supervisory staff, this situation should be recorded and reported to the supervisor of the purchasing unit for decision. If the supervisory office conducts a written review, the records and related documents must be sent to the supervisory office after the signature of the owner. Remember to write the words "Written Review and Supervision" on the record.
